import React from 'react'; import {Table,Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {USDFormat} from '../libs/numberFormat' import {Deposit} from './Deposit' import {Withdraw} from './Withdraw' import NPVChart from './NPVChart' class Summary extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); } render (){ console.log("Summary render") console.log(this.props) return (
Profit/Loss {USDFormat(this.props.summary.pnl)}
NPV {USDFormat(this.props.summary.npv)}
Cash Deposited    {USDFormat(this.props.summary.cashDep)}
Amount Allocated {USDFormat(this.props.summary.amountAlloc)}
Usage (%) {this.props.summary.usagePer}
Amount Free    {USDFormat(this.props.summary.amountFree)}
); } } export default Summary;
